bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of wind evil attacking the head and face, with tou feng 頭風 , head wind, and tou mian you feng 頭面游風 , wind roaming in the head and face. ZBY HL 2: 頭面風者，是體虛，諸陽經脈為風所乘也。諸陽經脈，上走於頭面 , “As for head and face wind , as the body is depleted all yang conduit vessels are occupied by wind. It moves upward through all yang conduit vessels to the head and face”.
